document.full_text: real salt lake of major league soccer plays the first match in a home-and-home total-goals series against monterrey of mexico, with the winner advancing to the fifa club world cup in japan in december.
document.title: real salt lake on a mission to japan
lines_and_colors: real salt lake of major league soccer plays the first match in a home-and-home total-goals series against monterrey of mexico, with the winner advancing to the fifa club world cup in japan in december.
